parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the database instance. You can call the [ListInstances](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/en/data-management-service/latest/listinstances) or [GetInstance](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/en/data-management-service/latest/getinstance) operation to query the database instance ID.

parameters.name: Password
parameters.description: The password of the database account.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description: The ID of the tenant. You can call the [GetUserActiveTenant](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/en/data-management-service/latest/getuseractivetenant) operation to query the tenant ID.

parameters.name: Username
parameters.description: The username of the database account.
